item.title: Where Am I?
item.description: It’s 2006 and we’re still messing up global navigation. Derek Powazek gets back to basics and offers a few simple guidelines for getting it right.
item.author: nospam@example.com (Derek Powazek)

item.title: Gentle Reader, Stay Awhile; I Will Be Faithful
item.description: Bloggers and copywriters take heed: it takes more than daily publication to build relationships. Amber Simmons provides advice on engaging readers and keeping them coming back.
item.author: nospam@example.com (Amber Simmons)
